Welcome to Shoutbox's documentation!
==================================

Shoutbox is a powerful, easy-to-use Python client for the Shoutbox Email API. 
It provides a simple interface for sending emails with support for attachments, 
custom headers, and seamless integration with popular Python web frameworks.

Features
--------

* REST API and SMTP support
* Type-safe email handling
* File attachments
* Custom headers
* Multiple recipient types
* Framework integrations (Flask/Django)
* Comprehensive error handling
* Full test coverage

Integration Methods
-----------------

1. Direct API calls (minimal dependencies)
2. Python library with pip
3. SMTP integration
4. Web framework integration
